pages.text: This entry shows every drop from the Iron Mesh (Waterlocked) that haven't been listed in the other entries

pages.title: Sand
pages.text: Sieving Sand with a Waterlocked Mesh will output:$(br)-Brain Coral Seed: 0.03$(br)-Bubble Coral Seed: 0.03$(br)-Fire Coral Seed: 0.03$(br)-Horn Coral Seed: 0.03$(br)-Kelp Seeds: 0.03$(br)-Tube Coral Seed: 0.03$(br)-Sea Pickle Egg: 0.02$(br)-Seagrass: 0.01

pages.title: Dirt
pages.text: Sieving Dirt with a Waterlocked Mesh will output:$(br)-Arid Garden: 0.1$(br)-Frost Garden: 0.1$(br)-Shaded Garden: 0.1$(br)-Soggy Garden: 0.1$(br)-Troical Garden: 0.1$(br)-Windy Garden: 0.1
